price: Nokorε sε, wͻn a wͻnnye Afutusεm no nnie wͻ εberε a abɛduru wͻn hͻ no (bɛnya asotwee). Nokorε sε (Qur’aan} yε Nwoma a εsom bo na edi mu paa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلذِّكۡرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَٰبٌ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū bil-dhik'ri lammā jāahum wa-innahu lakitābun ʿazīzun
